The energy drink category could be out there for him because of the explosion in that marketplace, says Headley. Stabilization Group"- a job for which Mr. Donald Rumsfeld writes that Ms. Condoleezza Rice and her staff did not have "the interest or skill." Officially, Mr. Paul Bremer reported to Mr. Donald Rumsfeld . But he viewed himself as the president's man, had a background in the State Department, and a relationship with Condoleezza Rice , says Mr. Donald Rumsfeld . So Mr. Paul Bremer chose what guidance he preferred, which Mr. Donald Rumsfeld describes as the equivalent of having "four or eight hands on the steering wheel." on Iraq troop draw down speed.| Reuters President Bush Defense Donald Rumsfeld is conceding "it's possible" that the biggest mistake of the Iraq war came in drawing down troops too quickly. I don't have enough confidence to say that that's right. I think that it's possible, he said. "We had[ an] enormous number of troops ready to go in.
